llm_rationale: High backlog requires aggressive ordering while staying solvent. Using EWMA of recent demand plus backlog clearance over 3 rounds.
llm_risk_assessment: Risk of continued stockouts if upstream supply chain cannot fulfill orders. Must balance backlog clearance with solvency.

llm_rationale: Retailer has 35 unit backlog and plans 18-22 unit orders. Need to prepare for higher incoming demand while managing costs.
llm_risk_assessment: Risk of stockout if Retailer orders above 20 units. Limited by cash balance constraints.

llm_rationale: Alternating 10/0 demand pattern clear. Need to clear backlog and build safety stock while managing costs.
llm_risk_assessment: Risk of continued backlog costs if order too low. Risk of high holding costs if order too high.

llm_rationale: Downstream agents report significant backlogs and plan 18-22 unit orders. Adjusting production to support chain recovery while managing costs.
llm_risk_assessment: Risk of excess inventory if downstream orders don't materialize as planned. Monitoring holding costs closely.
